'''Chained Reactions''' is [[Klee]]'s Level 1 [[Constellation]].

==Gameplay Notes==
* The spark is considered Elemental Burst DMG.
* The chance to summon a spark starts at 0%, increases by 8% every time a skill fails to summon a spark, and resets to 0% when a spark is summoned.
* The spark summoning attempt will be triggered once per use of Klee's Normal Attack, Charged Attack, Elemental Skill, or Elemental Burst.
